SELECT DISTINCT model.name AS model , carType.name AS carType , brand.name AS car_brand , GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT fuel.name SEPARATOR ', ') AS fuel , c.car_dayprice , c.car_hourprice , c.car_capacity , c.car_img FROM car c JOIN Common brand ON brand.code = c.car_brand JOIN Common model ON model.code = c.car_model JOIN Common carType ON carType.code = c.car_type JOIN Common fuel ON fuel.code = c.car_fuel
WHERE
brand.name LIKE concat('%', #{searchKeyword} , '%') model.name LIKE concat('%', #{searchKeyword} , '%') 1 = 1
GROUP BY model.name, carType.name, brand.name , c.car_dayprice, c.car_hourprice, c.car_capacity , c.car_img ORDER BY model.name LIMIT #{startRow} , #{listLimit}
